name: Mad Scientist (kakalambo)
description:
In Mad Scientist u have to stop a chemical experiment from exploding. In order to do that u drag the right chemicals in the container. By clicking and draging the green chemicals the challenge is to generate the highest score possible, before the container will explode.

The game was created for a 3 hour game-jam. I did all the  Assets expect for the Music myself.

Audio:  www.freesound.org
